secret_rule: Only items that are typically found in a bathroom can be brought to the picnic.

conversation.content: To start, here are some examples of items you can bring: "toothbrush" and "soap".
I would like to make a guess. Can I bring "shampoo" to the game?
I would like to make another guess. Can I bring "toothpaste" to the game?
I would like to make a new guess. Can I bring "body wash" to the game?
Yes, you can bring body wash.
I would like to make a new guess. Can I bring "lotion" to the game?

Based on the examples and responses from the game master, the secret rule seems to involve bringing items that are typically associated with personal hygiene or grooming. All of the items suggested—"toothbrush," "soap," "shampoo," "toothpaste," "body wash," and "lotion"—fall under the category of personal care products. 

Therefore, my best guess for the rule is: "You can bring items that are used for personal hygiene or grooming."
